review: I bought this because I previously had a Sony box that was just becoming a bit out-dated. I LOVE the Fire TV. I have use my Prime Account daily, either listening to music, watching tv/movies or ordering something or other.There is only one thing that I was disappointed in: you can't use voice search for anything other than the prime products. You can't use it in the apps like Netflix.I've only just scratched the surface too on usage, so I'm sure I'll continue to discover new things.Update 5/15/15 - I'm not so happy I purchased this now. I'm sick of Hulu Plus freezing up. I'm sick of not being able to watch movies on Netflix because the sound doesn't work. I'm going to return this and get a roku.
